column4: my computer is running exceptionally slow, and i don't know why.  it had been running fast for quite a while, but now even typing gives a huge lag..i have to sit and wait for the cursor to catch up.  how do i got about fixing this problem?  any help is appreciated.
use top to find what makes your computer slow
top shows firefox and xorg as the top two, both taking between 15-30% CPU, and firefox is just open in the background.
top says how much cpu used?
when i type anything in kile, xorg goes way above 50% cpu usage.  didn't have this problem before, and i haven't changed anything since yesterday when all was working nicely.
free -m and tell me what happens?
11 free, 497 total.  ah, well...clearly, that's a problem.  never had that much used before.
oh...wait, i had all these same things running yesterday, but i did suspend and resume once since then.  could that be adding to the problem?
you have not much ram, suspend is not the right way
sorry about that...i'm not sure what happened there exactly.  must've dropped my internet connection briefly.
try reboot and see if it works. do you already have Swap partition? you should have at least 1GB swap
i have a swap of 1.44gb, showing as ~300mb used.  any way to do this without rebooting?
ok.  i'll check it out.  if things are working, i won't sign back in, so thank you in advance.
